results.title: Effects of metformin on epicardial adipose tissue and atrial electromechanical delay of obese children with insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on epicardial adipose tissue and atrial @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Delayed</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006968 @@@electromechanical delay@@@ of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ children with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.

citations.NLM: Güneş H, Güneş H, Özmen Ş, Çelik E, Temiz F. Effects of metformin on epicardial adipose tissue and atrial electromechanical delay of obese children with insulin resistance. Cardiol Young. 2020 Oct;30(10):1429-1432. PMID: 32713411

results.title: Metformin treatment to prevent early puberty in girls with precocious pubarche.
results.text_hl: Available results also point to a @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-associated @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Delayed</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006968 @@@delay of menarche@@@ (P < 0.02).

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, Ong K, Valls C, Marcos MV, Dunger DB, de Zegher F. Metformin treatment to prevent early puberty in girls with precocious pubarche. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2006 Aug;91(8):2888-91. PMID: 16684823

results.title: Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS.
results.text_hl: Nowadays, @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ is treated successfully with the oral antidiabetic drug, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and hormone replacement therapy.

citations.NLM: Ayub M, Gul S, Zehra F. Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS. Pak J Pharm Sci. 2019 May;32(3):1107-1110. PMID: 31278727
